sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import jQuery from 'jquery' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' class RapportJournalier extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { regFormation: [], autreFrais: [], remboursFormat: [], regCycle: [], remboursCycle: [] } } componentDidMount() { if (JSON.parse((localStorage.getItem('userPermissions'))) != null) { var userPermissions = JSON.parse((localStorage.getItem('userPermissions'))); var anneeScolaire = userPermissions[0].anneeScolaire jQuery.ajax({ url: process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL + 'Back_mediatraining/RapportJour.php', type: 'POST', data: { anneeScolaire: anneeScolaire }, dataType: 'json', success: (code_html, statut) => { console.log(code_html) this.setState({ regFormation: code_html[0], autreFrais: code_html[1], remboursFormat: code_html[2], regCycle: code_html[3], remboursCycle: code_html[4] }); } }); } } render() { return (

); } } export default withRouter(RapportJournalier);
